div.p: ANTONIO: Remember, in order to begin changing our behaviors and the choices we make, we have to plan. And a plan of action starts with the five key elements that we've been discussing;
ANTONIO: One: set a date. Two: make a public statement of intent. Three: Identify alternatives. Four: Plan for obstacles. And, five: Identify support.
ANTONIO: If we can make it through this process we have a pretty good shot of making a positive change in our lives.
